column5: You should smoke weed, I do....i used to be suicidal and cut myself. If i didnt have weed i would either be dead or still cutting. I found something to take the edge off...also anyone around you that brings you down you gotta cut them from your life. I had to cut my family off they were toxic because they didnt understand my mental illness. But i do and i know what is good for me and whats not. I dont like ppl so i dont have friends. So that kinda works out for me.
Wow, I experience this ALL THE TIME!!! I get real hype about stuff then crash hard AF. im more fucked up then i thought lol
